document.full_text: a data breach involving online marketer epsilon, whose clients are a who's who of major banks and retailers, was only the latest in a string of hacking attacks aimed at getting email records for more thefts, security experts warned on monday.
document.title: analysis: epsilon hacking shows new "spear-phishing" risks
lines_and_colors: a data breach involving online marketer epsilon, whose clients are a who's who of major banks and retailers, was only the latest in a string of hacking attacks aimed at getting email records for more thefts, security experts warned on monday.
